title: The problem with the Rotating game modes.
body:
The problem with the rotating game modes that i have personally found, is that because they are up so often, metas are being built in these game modes, and making them less fun (i can't just pick whatever i want, i am confined to a meta now.)

What used to happen was you could dick around on any champion for the first day-day and a half, now, that time is actually extremely limited, because there are tons of people just picking the strong things the instant the game mode comes out, and this is not only confined to URF.

replies.body: its an infection. the tryhards wanna win and make the mode no fun for those trying less serious picks. me and my team are 5-28 at 14 minutes. im screwing around waiting for 20 to surrender. then as always, i start the surrender vote at 20, thinking everyone will in fact surrender, no need to beg or give explanation, i would think...."surrender vote failed at 1/5"....good stuff good stuff, love this game, love it, love my team, i love this situation, kill me now. but anyway now i have to tryhard in all the RGMs so i can keep my sanity
Exact reason why URF is shit, stale and flat out boring. People play the same shit game after game because they cant think for themselves and have some fun rather than only caring about winning...

I believe that Riot should monitor the first day and see who's getting picked/banned the most and then on Saturday disable them.

For example, the top 3 banned champs are disabled for Saturday and Sunday. Then on Saturday, the next three champs are banned.

Zed, Jax, Sona, Hecarim, Ekko, Shaco, Eve, etc. are in each game, assuming they're not banned.
They should establish some permabans imo

You can always get a bunch of mates together to play the RGM in a custom. Set the ground rules, "ban" the champs y'all don't want to see and have both teams talk smack in a Discord voice channel or something. Sure it takes effort to set up, or maybe not if your friends list is full of people ready to go, but it really is the best way to find the experience you're looking for.
They should just give both teams 65 bans each
